remarks: Special case of ~ itg2i1fseq2 : if the integral of ` F ` is a real number, then the standard limit relation holds on the integrals of simple functions approaching ` F ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Aug-2014.)
statement:
itg2i1fseq.1 $e |- ( ph -> F e. MblFn ) $.
itg2i1fseq.2 $e |- ( ph -> F : RR --> ( 0 [,) +oo ) ) $.
itg2i1fseq.3 $e |- ( ph -> P : NN --> dom S.1 ) $.
itg2i1fseq.4 $e |- ( ph -> A. n e. NN ( 0p oR <_ ( P ` n ) /\ ( P ` n ) oR <_ ( P ` ( n + 1 ) ) ) ) $.
itg2i1fseq.5 $e |- ( ph -> A. x e. RR ( n e. NN |-> ( ( P ` n ) ` x ) ) ~~> ( F ` x ) ) $.
itg2i1fseq.6 $e |- S = ( m e. NN |-> ( S.1 ` ( P ` m ) ) ) $.
itg2i1fseq3.7 $e |- ( ph -> ( S.2 ` F ) e. RR ) $.
itg2i1fseq3 $p |- ( ph -> S ~~> ( S.2 ` F ) ) $.
$d F m n x $.
$d P m n x $.
$d m ph $.
